Uses of Interface
javax.net.ssl.KeyManager

Packages that use KeyManager
javax.net.ssl This package provides all the classes and interfaces needed to implemenet and program the Secure Socket abstraction based on the SSL protocol SSSLv3.0 or TLSv1.2. 
 

Uses of KeyManager in javax.net.ssl
 

Subinterfaces of KeyManager in javax.net.ssl
 interface X509KeyManager
          A Key Manager for X509 certificate-based key pairs.
 

Classes in javax.net.ssl that implement KeyManager
 class X509ExtendedKeyManager
          The abstract extension for the X509KeyManager interface.
 

Methods in javax.net.ssl that return KeyManager
protected abstract  KeyManager[] KeyManagerFactorySpi.engineGetKeyManagers()
          Returns a list of key managers, one instance for each type of key in the key store.
 KeyManager[] KeyManagerFactory.getKeyManagers()
          Returns a list of key managers, one instance for each type of key in the key store.
